hero.title: Global Shipping & Logistics Solutions
hero.subtitle: Streamlined shipping and supply chain solutions for businesses of all sizes. Connecting continents with reliability and precision.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive logistics solutions tailored to your business needs.
services.oceanFreight.desc: Reliable and cost-effective ocean shipping solutions for containers and bulk cargo.
services.airFreight.desc: Express air freight services for time-sensitive shipments.
services.roadTransport.desc: Comprehensive inland transportation services with tracking capabilities.
services.warehousing.desc: State-of-the-art warehousing facilities with inventory management.
services.supplyChain.desc: End-to-end supply chain management with optimization strategies.
services.specialized.desc: Expert handling of hazardous materials and oversized cargo.

about.title: About OceanicShift
about.subtitle: Global shipping and logistics excellence since 2010

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Founded in 2010, OceanicShift began with a simple mission: to transform global shipping through innovation and reliability. What started as a small operation in San Francisco has grown into a worldwide logistics network serving over 120 countries.
story.p2: Our journey has been defined by a relentless focus on creating seamless supply chain solutions that empower businesses of all sizes to reach global markets efficiently.
story.p3: Today, OceanicShift stands as an industry leader, trusted by thousands of companies worldwide for their most critical shipping needs.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do
values.reliability.desc: We understand that businesses depend on consistent, trustworthy service.
values.innovation.desc: We continuously seek better ways to serve our clients through technological innovation.
values.customer.desc: Our clients' success is our success.
values.excellence.desc: We hold ourselves to the highest standards in every aspect of our operations.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team for shipping inquiries, quotes, and support
contact.name: Full Name

contact.messageReceived: We have received your message and will get back to you shortly.

tracking.globalCoverageDesc: Track shipments worldwide with real-time updates

footer.description: Pioneering global logistics with cutting-edge solutions since 2010. We connect businesses across oceans with reliability and precision.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from businesses that trust us with their shipping needs
testimonials.quote1: OceanicShift has transformed our international shipping operations. Their reliable service and innovative tracking system have significantly improved our supply chain efficiency.
testimonials.quote2: The level of customer service and attention to detail is outstanding. They've helped us expand our business globally with confidence.
testimonials.quote3: Their specialized shipping solutions have been crucial for our sensitive equipment transport. Truly a partner we can trust.
